message.pattern: <@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> MSWinEventLog;<@NUMBER:criticity@>;<@WORD:src@>;<@NUMBER:event_count@>;<@DATE_TIME_APACHE_ERROR:datetime2@>;<@NUMBER:event_id@>;<@STRING:source@>;<@STRING:user@>;<@WORD:sid_type@>;<@REGEXP("Error"):event_type@>;<@WORD:computer@>;<@REGEXP("None"):category@>;<@REGEXP(".+An error occurred while retrieving a digital certificate from the inserted smart card.+"):msg@>

<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> MSWinEventLog;<@NUMBER:criticity@>;<@WORD:src@>;<@NUMBER:event_count@>;<@DATE_TIME_APACHE_ERROR:datetime2@>;<@NUMBER:event_id@>;<@STRING:source@>;<@STRING:user@>;<@WORD:sid_type@>;<@REGEXP("Error"):event_type@>;<@WORD:computer@>;<@REGEXP("None"):category@>;<@REGEXP(".+An error occurred while signing a message using the inserted smart card: An unexpected card error has occurred.+"):msg@>

<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> MSWinEventLog;<@NUMBER:criticity@>;<@WORD:src@>;<@NUMBER:event_count@>;<@DATE_TIME_APACHE_ERROR:datetime2@>;<@NUMBER:event_id@>;<@STRING:source@>;<@STRING:user@>;<@WORD:sid_type@>;<@REGEXP("Error"):event_type@>;<@WORD:computer@>;<@REGEXP("None"):category@>;<@REGEXP(".+An error occurred while signing a message using the inserted smart card: The supplied PIN is incorrect.+"):msg@>

<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> MSWinEventLog;<@NUMBER:criticity@>;<@WORD:src@>;<@NUMBER:event_count@>;<@DATE_TIME_APACHE_ERROR:datetime2@>;<@NUMBER:event_id@>;<@STRING:source@>;<@STRING:user@>;<@WORD:sid_type@>;<@REGEXP("Error"):event_type@>;<@WORD:computer@>;<@REGEXP("None"):category@>;<@REGEXP(".+An error occurred while signing a message using the inserted smart card: The card cannot be accessed because the wrong PIN was presented.+"):msg@>
